about_the_game:
Death Run: The Ultimate First-Person Parkour Game in the Sky! Embark on an exhilarating journey across floating platforms suspended above the clouds. Your mission? Stay alive and navigate to the portal that leads to the next level. Beat the clock to achieve the highest score. Dodge obstacles and avert death through strategic navigation and precise jumping. Are you up for the challenge to conquer the game?

Key Features


  • No Checkpoints: A single mistake means restarting from the level's beginning.
  • Challenging Levels: Each level ramps up in complexity with deadly traps and obstacles.
  • Original Soundtracks: Immerse yourself in multiple catchy tunes while playing.
  • Built-in Timer and Death Counter: Track your progress and improve your strategy.
  • Open Sky Environment: Enjoy vast, cloud-top landscapes without any claustrophobic indoor constraints.
  • Varied Mechanics: Master different skills to achieve top scores and beat the game.
detailed_description:
Death Run: The Ultimate First-Person Parkour Game in the Sky! Embark on an exhilarating journey across floating platforms suspended above the clouds. Your mission? Stay alive and navigate to the portal that leads to the next level. Beat the clock to achieve the highest score. Dodge obstacles and avert death through strategic navigation and precise jumping. Are you up for the challenge to conquer the game?

Key Features


  • No Checkpoints: A single mistake means restarting from the level's beginning.
  • Challenging Levels: Each level ramps up in complexity with deadly traps and obstacles.
  • Original Soundtracks: Immerse yourself in multiple catchy tunes while playing.
  • Built-in Timer and Death Counter: Track your progress and improve your strategy.
  • Open Sky Environment: Enjoy vast, cloud-top landscapes without any claustrophobic indoor constraints.
  • Varied Mechanics: Master different skills to achieve top scores and beat the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7 like or SteamOS
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7 like or SteamOS
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple M1+ or Intel Core M+
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple M1+ or Intel Core M+
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 420 MB available space

name: Death Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD® Athlon™ X2, min. 2.8 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 2048 MB memory
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Quad / AMD® Phenom™ X4, min. 3,4 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 4096 MB memory
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Death Run: The ultimate first-person parkour game in the sky! Experience a journey over floating platforms. Your mission: Survive and find the portal to the next level. Beat the clock for a high score. Dodge obstacles to win. Are you ready?
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
